tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE localization_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_id INT,
    language_code VARCHAR,
    display_name VARCHAR,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE localization_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    key VARCHAR(255),
    en_text TEXT,
    fr_text TEXT,
    es_text TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE localization_data (id INT PRIMARY KEY, game_id INT, language_code VARCHAR(2), text TEXT);
CREATE TABLE games (game_id INT PRIMARY KEY, title TEXT, description TEXT);
CREATE TABLE languages (id INT PRIMARY KEY, language_code VARCHAR(2), language_name TEXT);

CREATE TABLE LocalizationData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_id INT,
    language_code VARCHAR(2),
    key VARCHAR(255),
    value TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Games (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    developer VARCHAR(255),
    release_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Languages (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    code VARCHAR(2),
    name VARCHAR(50),
    native_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Developers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    website VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Platforms (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    release_year INT,
    country VARCHAR(50)
)
